mapper.select: SELECT i.film_id filmId, f.title title, i.store_id storeId, i.inventory_id inventoryId, r.return_date returnDate, r.rental_date rentalDate FROM film f LEFT JOIN inventory i ON i.film_id = f.film_id LEFT JOIN rental r ON i.inventory_id = r.inventory_id GROUP BY i.inventory_id HAVING i.film_id = #{filmId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT i.film_id filmId, f.title title, i.store_id storeId, COUNT(*) cnt FROM inventory i LEFT JOIN film f ON i.film_id = f.film_id GROUP BY i.film_id, i.store_id) s
title like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
